alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal St. Johns; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 18 at 1:54PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern St. Johns and southeastern Duval Counties through 230 PM EDT... At 154 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Durbin to World Golf Village. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Ponte Vedra Beach, Jacksonville Beach, World Golf Village, Palm Valley, Sawgrass, South Ponte Vedra, Nocatee, Bayard, Durbin and Guana River State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Coastal St. Johns; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval
